sections.paragraph: + Son of Becher, the son of Benjamin. (1 Chronicles 7:8) + Wife of Hezron. (1 Chronicles 2:24) + Second son of Samuel. (1 Samuel 8:2; 1 Chronicles 7:28) + The son of Rehoboam. (1 Chronicles 3:10; Matthew 1:7) See [14]Abijah Or Abijam, 1. + Mother of King Hezekiah. [[15]Abi] + Same as [16]Abijah Or Abijam, 4.
